articles.title: Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine is ready to be administered in the Houston area with new group priority - KTRK-TV
articles.description: Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine is ready to be administered in the Houston area in Memorial Hermann's Phase 1B of allocating the medicine. Healthcare officials said this time, anyone over the age of 65 or older than 16 with a chronic illness can get the drug.
